|1effect=If unit can transform, transformation effects gain "if unit is within 2 spaces of a beast or dragon ally, or if number of adjacent allies other than beast or dragon allies ≤ 2" as a trigger condition (in addition to existing conditions).<br><br>If defending in Aether Raids, at the start of enemy turn 1, if conditions for transforming are met, unit transforms.<br><br>If unit is transformed or if foe's HP ≥ 75% at start of combat, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+X+8 to unit and reduces damage from foe's attacks by X × 4 during combat (X = number of spaces from start position to end position of whoever initiated combat; max 3; excluding area-of-effect Specials), and also, when foe's attack triggers foe's Special, reduces damage by an additional X × 4 (excluding area-of-effect Specials).<br><br>If unit is transformed or if foe's HP ≥ 75% at start of combat, grants Special cooldown charge +1 to unit per attack (only highest value applied; does not stack) and reduces the percentage of foe's non-Special "reduce damage by X%" skills by 50% during combat (excluding area-of-effect Specials).
|1cost=300
|1required=-
}}
